title: Urban Tree Grant Program
description: Apply for grants to plant and maintain trees in urban areas. This program supports municipalities and community groups in expanding urban canopy.
eligibility: Municipalities, non-profits, and community organizations within the service area.
deadline_info: Applications are accepted during the grant cycle. See dates below.

program.name: Urban Tree Grant Program
program.purpose: Support urban canopy expansion through tree planting and maintenance grants.

eligibility_config.summary: Municipalities, non-profits, and community organizations within the service area.
